TRAILERS

by
May 19, 2025
Source: YouTube

"There's only one way to kill it... we must fight together!" 20th Century has unveiled a second trailer for the animated movie Predator: Killer of Killers, an anthology feature made by filmmaker Dan Trachtenberg. The first of two new Predator movies made by Trachtenberg following Prey from 2022 (which I still think should've been released in theaters). Predator: Killer of Killers is an animated anthology feature containing three stories that will be released streaming on Hulu in June this summer. His next live-action feature is called Predator: Badlands, and it's currently set to hit theaters on November 7th this fall. It looks like it will kick ass as much as this, too. The hunt begins. Three legendary warriors – a Viking mother seeking vengeance, a ninja fighting his samurai brother, and a WWII pilot facing cosmic horrors – become prey to an unstoppable hunter of killers. "Most characters are dealing with generational [issues], trying to break a cycle. All the chapters are different genre-wise," Dan explains. The voice cast features Lindsay LaVanchy, Louis Ozawa, Rick Gonzalez, and Michael Biehn. The other trailer was already awesome, this is even better. Totally sold on all this footage and these three storylines - cannot wait to dive into these next month.

Here's the second trailer (+ poster) for Dan Trachtenberg's Predator: Killer of Killers, from YouTube:

You can rewatch the first trailer for Predator: Killer of Killers animated movie right here for more footage.

The animated action-adventure anthology story follows three of the fiercest warriors in human history: a Viking raider guiding her young son on a bloody quest for revenge, a ninja in feudal Japan who turns against his Samurai brother in a brutal battle for succession, and a WWII pilot who takes to the sky to investigate an otherworldly threat to the Allied cause. But while all these warriors are killers in their own right, they are merely prey for their new opponent–the ultimate killer of killers. Predator: Killer of Killers is an animated anthology movie directed by acclaimed American filmmaker Dan Trachtenberg, director of the films 10 Cloverfield Lane and Prey previously, as well as episodes of "Black Mirror" and "The Boys", plus many other shorts. Co-directed by Joshua Wassung. The screenplay is written by Micho Robert Rutare; from stories written by Micho Robert Rutare and Dan Trachtenberg. Based on characters created by Jim Thomas & John Thomas. Produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt. Made by 20th Century Animation and Davis Entertainment. Hulu will release Dan Trachtenberg's anthology film Predator: Killer of Killers streaming on Hulu starting June 6th, 2025 this summer. Who's down for this?
